row.process: ! Retention Days Modification :IF GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RESTART_RUNID#,RETENTION_DAYS#) <> "" : SET &@RET_DAYS# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RESTART_RUNID#,RETENTION_DAYS#) : SET &@RET_DAYS# = RESOLVE_VAR(&@RET_DAYS#) : IF ISNUMERIC(&@RET_DAYS#) = "Y" : SET &@RET_DATE# = ADD_DAYS(&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#,&@RET_DAYS#) : PUT VARA.REGISTERED_OUTPUTFILES,"&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN#,&uc_register_ofile",&uc_register_ofile,&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN#,&@RET_DATE#,&$RESTART_RUNID# : PUT VARA.REGISTERED_OUTPUTFILES.AGENTS,"&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN#",&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN# : ENDIF :ENDIF
